EmailTemplate.subject: Now More Than Ever!!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Now More Than Ever... Your Merchants Need Cash!!!
Talk to your merchants about their cash needs before your competitor does!!
Easy Access To Financing - 3 Minute Application - High Approval
Smart For Your Business - Unsecured - No Fixed Monthly Payments
Fast Access To Funds - Funding Within 10 Days - Free Quote
KEEP IT SIMPLE!!
Just submit a 3 Minute Application and the last 4 months of processing statements and RapidAdvance can take care of the rest!
For more details on our Cash Advance Program, please call Rachel Bachman at 240.482.4698 or email rbachman@rapidadvance.com
